For example, a 30-minute duration of per gathering round means that, it will keep gathering for 30 minutes first, then exit the duty and count the materials to finish the round after, and re-join the duty to start a new round at last.
AutoGatherDiadem-Mode-Clouded-Descriptio:
Behaviour Brief:
	- Only the clouded materials of Fourth Restoration Phase will be gathered if no item names were specified.
	- The character will only act during special weathers which are not in the blacklist. The character will be at the beginning position when idle.
AutoGatherDiadem-Mode-Leveling-Descripti:
Behaviour Brief:
	- Recommended gears will be applied after every time that the character levels up.
	- Only the materials for artisanal products of Fourth Restoration Phase without the highest level requirements will be gathered.
	- You can't set or specify the items to be gathered and related settings will be invalid.
	- Clouded gathering nodes will never be touched.
	- If the level threshold of the current job has been reached, the module will switch to the another job which hasn't reached its threshold yet.
	- After both the job has reached their thresholds, if the level threshold of the current job has been reached.

Note:
	- Both Miner and Botanist have to be greater than or equal to Level 10, and at least one gear set for each job has been set before running the module.
AutoGatherDiadem-Mode-SkillPT-Descriptio:
Behaviour Brief:
	- Only the materials of Fourth Restoration Phase will be gathered if no item names were specified.
	- Clouded gathering nodes will only be gathered when they're closer than any other nodes.
	- If one job has reached 400,000 Skyward Points, then the module will switch to the another job. If both the jobs have reached 400,000 Skyward Points, then the module will continue to grind until both have reached 500,000. After that, auto gathering will end and the character will leave the duty.

ModuleCategory-Description-Action: The modules which optimize, modify or automate various actions and combos.
ModuleCategory-Description-Assist: The modules which is only designed for specific duties, or which is designed for external calls from modules, plugins or triggers so that they generally don't directly benefit users.
ModuleCategory-Description-Combat: The modules which optimize combat experience without involving actions and combos in particular.
ModuleCategory-Description-General: The modules which are not categorized for now.
ModuleCategory-Description-GoldSaucer: The modules which are related to Gold Saucer.
ModuleCategory-Description-Notice: The modules which send notifications based on various conditions.
ModuleCategory-Description-Script: The modules which repeat a series of operations for certain purposes, just like scripts.
ModuleCategory-Description-System: The modules which optimize various systems or underlying structures of the game.
ModuleCategory-Description-UIOperation: The modules which provide automation for various interrelated or continuous operations in the in-game interfaces.
ModuleCategory-Description-UIOptimizatio: The modules which optimize the vanilla in-game interfaces, or replace vanilla interfaces with optimized ones.

That is, the maximum number of people allowed for each role in a single recruitment. If ≥ the set number, it will be hidden. Set to -1 to ignore.

In automatic mode, only the number of people corresponding to the current role will be applied.
In manual mode, the number of people for all roles will be applied.

Settings-Auth-FailContactingServer: Failed to get auth info. Please check your local network settings.
Settings-Auth-HelpContent:
Daily Routines is a free plugin, and no features require payment.

However, some features/modules (about one-third) need to be opened through regular and free online verification. At the same time, if you want to get our support or help, you also need to pass at least one online verification.

To complete the verification, please join our Discord server (there is a relevant jump button in the upper left corner of the main interface), and follow the instructions to send a private message to the robot to complete it by yourself.
Settings-BlacklistedNotice: You have been blacklisted and cannot use Daily Routines.
Settings-NeedConnectToAuthServer: Please connect to the authentication server first
Settings-NeedLoginToAnyCharacter: Please log in to any character first
Settings-PremiumCredentialHelp: This feature is an internal testing channel, unrelated to sponsorship, and not open to the public
Settings-TipMessage1: Don't check same function in other plugins to avoid compatibility problems because a function may be realized by different plugins with different method.
Settings-TipMessage2: 2. If "Prerequisite Module" appears in the module description, it means this module requires the support of the specified module to function properly. Prerequisite modules can be substituted by similar functionalities from other plugins.
Settings-TipMessage3: 3. In case of a game crash, please first check other installed plugins and software. Before providing any feedback, ensure the issue can be consistently reproduced with only Daily Routines enabled.
Settings-TranslationUpdatedMessage: Downloaded the translated text from the cloud and updated it
